name: fsjs-p2-v1-c1-server-bmnaufaal
description: [![Open in Visual Studio Code](https://classroom.github.com/assets/open-in-vscode-c66648af7eb3fe8bc4f294546bfd86ef473780cde1dea487d3c4ff354943c9ae.svg)](https://classroom.github.com/online_ide?assignment_repo_id=10108370&assignment_repo_type=AssignmentRepo) # p2-cms-integration-server CMS Integration - Server

scripts.reset-db: sequelize db:drop && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate
scripts.reset-db-test: sequelize db:drop --env test && sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test
scripts.reset-db-seed: sequelize db:drop && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.reset-db-seed-test: sequelize db:drop --env test && sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test && sequelize db:seed:all --env test

author: bmnaufaal
